https://tmrev.io/movie/548194-Children of the Snow Land 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/18IPLVl0DztmZXO2Zh2PBMW2kRu.jpg The extraordinary story of children born in High Himalayas of Nepal. At 4 years old, they're sent to school in the city, hoping education means a better life. They do not see their parents again for 12 years. Now, aged 16, they trek home. Children of the Snow Land
